ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Re: RE: Class balance
ygData.msgSnippet: Probably could have if we hadn t gotten so damn spoiled having the Necro there....  Like I said, our biggest problem was the spawns were spaced to close
ygData.messageBody:
Probably could have if we hadn't gotten so damn spoiled having the Necro
there.... Like I said, our biggest problem was the spawns were spaced to
close together to hold the room without the necro there. Against the lord,
the necro definately did a lot more damage then the wizard was able to...

> spawn. IIRC the smallest/weakest group i've done lord
> with was: 50 war, 49 cleric, 48 druid, 50 rogue, 42
> shaman? Something like that...so I would have thought
> you could hold it just fine with either wiz or necro.
>
> -David
>
